articles.author: Ryan O'Hare
articles.title: Plant-based ultra-processed foods linked with higher risk of cardiovascular disease - Medical Xpress
articles.description: New analysis of the health impacts of plant-based ultra-processed foods (UPFs) has found they may pose a higher risk for cardiovascular diseases compared to less-processed plant-based foods.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Mars: 'Impossible' Discovery As Frost Found Near Equator - Forbes
articles.description: Frost has been spotted near Mars's equator for the first time, on its largest volcanoes, challenging previous beliefs about the martian climate.
articles.content: This image shows Olympus Mons, the tallest volcano not only on Mars but in the entire Solar System. ... [+] The volcano measures some 600 km across. It was obtained in the early morning (7:20am Local… [+4007 chars]
